title: What is the most ugly things about social media? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are so many ways you can go with this answer, but I will offer this: It’s killing reading. People can’t read deeply anymore, especially long texts. They are blithely unaware of current events except for the most superficial stuff — what celebrity wore what, for example. Books? Newspapers? Smart people still read these, but average folks — who follow the trends of their peers — avoid them. But they spend hours on sites. And how can they get through a book with push announcements always beeping? Social media has given us all ADD. Yes, I know — we are reading now. But there’s reading and there’s reading. The latter is what we’re doing less of — what, to stare at yet another kitten meme?
